topic.title: Delete a Bucket
topic.shortdesc: Deleting a bucket and then recreating it is sometimes faster than deleting all objects in an existing bucket.

section.title: Administrator Authorization
section.p:
To delete a Couchbase bucket, an administrator must have one of these roles:
Full administrator
Cluster administrator

section.title: Deleting a Bucket
section.p: To delete a bucket using the Couchbase Web Console:

ol.li: Go to the Data Buckets tab and click the blue triangle next to the bucket name.

The standard bucket editing screen will appear and in the lower left corner (you may have to scroll down) there is the Delete button in red.
Click on it and confirm the deletion.

section.p: You can also use the CLI command bucket-delete or REST API command rest-bucket-delete.
